com.pos.device.emv

Interface IEMVCallback.EMVInitListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    IEMVCallback

    public static interface IEMVCallback.EMVInitListener
    EMV process callback interface.

    • Method Detail

      • candidateAppsSelection

        int candidateAppsSelection()
        Callback method to get the candidate application
        Returns:
        success if returns 0 else failure.

      • multiLanguageSelection

        void multiLanguageSelection()
        Callback method to set multi-language.

      • getAmount

        int getAmount(int[] transAmount,
            int[] cashBackAmount)
        Callback method to get transaction amount and back amount from application.
        Parameters:
        transAmount - The transaction amount from application.
        cashBackAmount - The transaction back amount from application.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • getPin

        int getPin(int[] pinLen,
         byte[] cardPin)
        Deprecated. 
        Get PIN of card from application.
        Parameters:
        pinLen - The PIN array real length, pinLen[0] represents it.
        cardPin - The PIN array from application.
        Returns:

      • getOfflinePin

        int getOfflinePin(int keySystem,
                RsaPinKey rsaKey,
                byte[] length,
                byte[] respData)
        Get the response of IC card when get offline pin.
        Parameters:
        keySystem - the Offline plaintext PIN (the value is 0) or cipher PIN ( the value is 1).
        rsaKey - the RSA key entity.
        length - length[0] represents the real length of respData.
        respData - the response data form IC card.
        Returns:
        returned 0 if success else failed.

      • pinVerifyResult

        int pinVerifyResult(int tryCount)
        Verify the PIN
        Parameters:
        tryCount - The count of PIN verified, if tryCount is 0 that represents the PIN is right.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • checkOnlinePIN

        int checkOnlinePIN()
        Check the PIN via online.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • checkCertificate

        int checkCertificate()
        Check the Certificate.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • onlineTransactionProcess

        int onlineTransactionProcess(byte[] rspCode,
                           byte[] authCode,
                           int[] authCodeLen,
                           byte[] authData,
                           int[] authDataLen,
                           byte[] script,
                           int[] scriptLen,
                           byte[] onlineResult)
        EMV online transaction process callback.
        Parameters:
        rspCode - The response code, it has 2 bytes.
        authCode - The authentication code array.
        authCodeLen - The real length of authentication code array,it has one byte. The authCodeLen[0] represents it.
        authData - The authentication data array.
        authDataLen - The real length of authentication data, the authDataLen[0] represents it.
        script - The script data.
        scriptLen - The real length of script data, the scriptLen[0] represents it.
        onlineResult - Online transaction process result,0:Accept 1:reject 2:voice reference.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • issuerReferralProcess

        int issuerReferralProcess()
        The issuer referral process.
        Returns:
        returns 0: APPROVED；-1: Failed

      • adviceProcess

        int adviceProcess(int firstFlg)
        The process advice to terminal.
        Parameters:
        firstFlg - The first flag of process advice.
        Returns:
        0: Success；Other: Failed

      • checkRevocationCertificate

        int checkRevocationCertificate(int caIndex,
                             byte[] RID,
                             byte[] certSN)
        Check the revocation certificate.
        Parameters:
        caIndex - The index of certificate.
        RID - The RID information of certificate.
        certSN - The serial number of certificate.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

      • checkExceptionFile

        int checkExceptionFile(int panLen,
                     byte[] pan,
                     int panSN)
        Check the exception file.
        Parameters:
        panLen - The length of PAN.
        pan - The PAN data.
        panSN - The serial number of PAN.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.

        Parameters:

        pan - the PAN data.
        panSN - The serial number of PAN.
        Returns:
        To tell the EMV core success if returns 0 else failure.
